summary: David Ooi is the senior regional director of Server and Network Platform Solutions at NEC Asia Pacific, a Japanese IT solution company. Ooi was recently in Nepal to organise a workshop for local distributors and resellers, besides launching new products. There are much basic infrastructure is in the process of growing that signals the potential of IT and network servers in Nepal. Lately, people have started understanding the importance of communication server for the works to be done fast and our  business  is also growing fast.
title: use-of-it-and-network-servers-growing-in-nepal
